data.text: @roarkka Be careful.  These people are unhinged.

@roarkka Ha! I know the owner. Interesting character. He’s gone through some stuff & clearly came out of it on the more fundamentalist side of things, I just peeked at their website. Every blog written by him & they’re so bizarre.
@roarkka Ooh, Pearl’s carries it? Not sure what to think about that one.
@roarkka I've already got a snake sticker. I'd be hoping for an Appeal to Heaven tree flag.
